descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new masked hood that you can craft at the forge.
LIGHT ARMOR AND CLOTH VARIANT!
Tempering of the light variant uses steel smithing perk. (Because you can get it easily)
Same AR as thieves guild leader hood.
Roughly based on:
http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1236-leather-headwrap-resource/
And this was requested at forums, did a quick sketch, people liked it, so I ended up making it as a mod.

WARNING! FEMALE VERSION DOESN\'T HAVE MASK. YET.
I kept getting errors with it, so I decided to upload the \"working product\"
Mask might clip if you character has huge face or long beard.

The mod is as it is, I\'ll try to fix the female mask, but this is not any sort of long-term project.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/202105
^ That is my long project.

Credits:
Shodan44 for the mask:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7715
author: Shadowjin
